Functions
raise_assertion_finding
procedure raise_assertion_finding(
p_message_name in varchar2,
p_msg_args msg_args,
p_affected_id in varchar2,
p_affected_ids in msg_params,
p_error_code in varchar2,
p_severity in binary_integer
)

Method raises a message, respecting the severity settings

Parameters
p_condition

String expression to check.

p_message_name
in varchar2

Name of the message. Reference to package MSG

p_msg_args
msg_args

Optional list of replacement information

p_affected_id
in varchar2

Optional id of an item a message relates to

p_affected_ids
in msg_params

Optional list of parameters a message relates to

p_error_code
in varchar2

Optional error code, usable by external applications

p_severity
in binary_integer

Optional severity, overrides the message severity
